node.excerpt: A  Segment  is a group of options, presented as buttons. Only one option may be selected at once. Props Prop Type Default Notes value string null The selected option. options string [] [] The Segment’s options. disabled boolean false validation…

A  NavigationBar  models the top navigation bar of an iOS app. The bar has a title, an optional subtitle, and two tappable areas on its left and right sides. Each of these areas may have a link, icon or both. The bar has a taller “large” mode that…

Value Each of the input components in the Learn package accept a  value  prop. We can use this prop to set the initial value of the input, or to sync its value with another part of our project’s state. Different input components have values of…

A  Button  can display either text or an icon. It can be tapped and will run an  onTap  callback when tapped. It may optionally be toggled with each tap. Props Prop Type Default Notes text string "Get Started!” icon string ”none" See  Icon  below…
